name: Jumpy Sheep
description:
DOWNLOAD FOR iOS: https://apps.apple.com/gb/app/id1511334630

Description

Jumpy Sheep is an endless arcade-like jumping game where you main goal is to score is many points as possible! Collect coins along the way to unlock over 30 characters and 5 unique levels. Tilt your device to move you character as you jump your way up the platforms in the sky! There are 4 unique platform types - the normal platform, the breakable platform, the moving platform and the vanishing platform -so be careful and try not to fall! Try your luck on the spinning wheel - unlock new characters, or earn more coins for the price of 50 coins per spin! How many points will you be able to score? Challenge your friends to see how many points they can get too!
